      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add an object to the layer.
      int Layer.add(GameObject object, int index)
      Add an object to the layer at the given index.
      void Room.addObject(GameObject object)
      Adds a GameObject to the default layer.
      int Room.addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, int index)
      Adds the given object to the layer at the given index.
      int Room.addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, int index, int layerIndex)
      Adds the given object to the given position in the layer at the given index.
      int Room.addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, Layer layer)
      Adds the given object to the given layer.
      int Room.addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, Layer layer, int layerIndex)
      Adds the given object to the given layer at the given index in the layer.
      int Room.addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, java.lang.String string)
      Adds the given object to the layer with the given name.
      int Room.addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, java.lang.String string, int layerIndex)
      Adds the given object to the layer with the given name at the given index in the layer.
      void Layer.remove(GameObject object)
      Removes the given object from the layer.
      Constructors in game with parameters of type GameObject 
      Constructor and Description
      Layer(GameObject[] objects)
      Creates a new layer and initializes it with the given objects.
